channel.title: Production Ready Case
channel.description: Are there plans to have a production ready case for Carloop?

item.title: Production Ready Case
item.dc:creator: jnbankston
item.description:
@cyclin_al1,
Thanks for your response. I was hoping something was available for purchase to protect the device when deploying into customers vehicles. Ill take your advice and look at MakerSpace. Thanks again.

Read full topic

item.title: Production Ready Case
item.dc:creator: cyclin_al1
item.description:
@jnbankston,
I am not sure the Carloop team is planning on a case for Carloop.
I believe their idea was to keep it small and low-profile so that it would fit onto the OBD2 port of any car.
Also, it is desirable to not add anything which might reduce the signal strength of the WiFi, Cellular, GPS or other wireless connection.

Your best bet might be to 3D print something at a MakerSpace that will fit your particular vehicle.

Read full topic
